title: Lost Season 1 - encoded for iPod - Wide Screen minus letterbox
description:
[b]Description[/b]

All 24 episodes from the first season of LOST, encoded to the m4v format
so that no extra conversion is necessary. The data is optimized for 
tv playback, and the quality is near that of apple. The iPod will automatically
adjust the video to display at full frame, while the tv output will be wide screen where supported. Any artifacts or pixelated areas in the video stream
when scaled down looks absolutely brilliant on the iPod screen. Enjoy.

[b]Video[/b]

Codec/Info : H.264
Codec/CC : avc1 
Bit rate : 1408 Kbps 
Width : 640 pixels 
Height : 358 pixels 
Display Aspect ratio : 16/9 
Frame rate : 23.976 fps 

[b]Audio[/b]

Codec/Info : AAC Low Complexity 
Bit rate : 128 Kbps 
Channel(s) : 2 channels 
Channel positions : L R 
Sampling rate : 48 KHz 
Resolution : 16 bits
